summary: Iteration 14 - Tested Dashboard metrics (Won/Lost/Active/Pipeline), Create Opportunity dialog field removal (Source, Estimated Value), and Client page opportunities separation. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: API: /api/reports/summary returns won, lost, active, pipeline counts and values
API: /api/organizations/{org_id}/summary returns active_opportunities and pipeline_opportunities arrays
API: Opportunity creation works without source and estimated_value fields
Dashboard: Shows 8 metric cards - Total Pipeline, Weighted Forecast, Overdue Activities, At-Risk Deals, Won (Closed), Lost (Closed), Active (Closed Won), Pipeline (Open)
Dashboard: Won card shows count and value correctly (1 deals, $100,000)
Dashboard: Lost card shows count and value correctly (0 deals, $0)
Dashboard: Active card shows count and value (same as Won - 1 deals, $100,000)
Dashboard: Pipeline card shows count and value correctly (5 deals, $941,184)
Pipeline Page: Create Opportunity dialog does NOT have 'Source' dropdown field
Pipeline Page: Create Opportunity dialog does NOT have 'Estimated Value' field
Pipeline Page: Create Opportunity dialog has: Opportunity Name, Organization, Owner, Engagement Type, Initial Stage, Confidence
Client Page: Create Opportunity dialog does NOT have 'Source' dropdown field
Client Page: Create Opportunity dialog does NOT have 'Estimated Value' field
Client Page: Shows 'Pipeline Opportunities' section separately (2 opportunities)
Client Page: Shows 'Active Opportunities - Closed Won' section separately (1 opportunity)
Client Page: Won/Lost value stats displayed (Won: $100K, Lost: $0)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 14 verified: 1) Dashboard now shows 8 metric cards in 2 rows - top row has Total Pipeline/Weighted Forecast/Overdue Activities/At-Risk Deals, bottom row has Won (Closed)/Lost (Closed)/Active (Closed Won)/Pipeline (Open). 2) /api/reports/summary endpoint returns won, lost, active, pipeline objects with count and value. 3) Create Opportunity dialog on Pipeline page has fields: Opportunity Name*, Organization*, Owner*, Engagement Type, Initial Stage, Confidence (%) - NO Source or Estimated Value fields. 4) Create Opportunity dialog on Client page has same fields - NO Source or Estimated Value fields. 5) Client detail page Opportunities section is now split into 'Pipeline Opportunities' (open deals) and 'Active Opportunities - Closed Won' with visual separation and different styling (blue border for pipeline, green border with 'Closed Won' badge for active). 6) /api/organizations/{org_id}/summary returns active_opportunities and pipeline_opportunities arrays.

verified_features.dashboard_won_card: Working - Shows count and value for Closed Won opportunities
verified_features.dashboard_lost_card: Working - Shows count and value for Closed Lost opportunities
verified_features.dashboard_active_card: Working - Shows count and value (same as Won)
verified_features.dashboard_pipeline_card: Working - Shows count and value for Open opportunities
verified_features.client_page_pipeline_opportunities_secti: Working - Shows open opportunities in blue-bordered cards
verified_features.client_page_active_opportunities_section: Working - Shows Closed Won opportunities in green-bordered cards with badge
verified_features.api_org_summary_separated_opps: Working - Returns active_opportunities and pipeline_opportunities arrays
